Package nl.strohalm.cyclos.controls.members.messages

Class Summary
ChangeMessageStatusAction Action used to change the status for a message list
ChangeMessageStatusForm Form used to change the status for a message list
EditMessageCategoryAction Action that manage the Message Category.
EditMessageCategoryForm Form to edit a message Category;
ListMessageCategoriesAction Takes care of listing the Message Categories.
RemoveMessageCategoryAction Removes the message category
RemoveMessageCategoryForm Form class to use to remove a message category.
SearchMessageCategoriesAjaxAction Searches message categories and returns the list as an JSON
SearchMessageCategoriesAjaxForm Form used for Ajax message categories search
SearchMessagesAction Action used to search messages
SearchMessagesForm Form used to search messages
SendMessageAction Action used to send a message
SendMessageForm Action used to send a message
ViewMessageAction Action used to view a given message
ViewMessageForm Action used to view a given message
 

Enum Summary
SendMessageAction.SendTo An enum indicating where to send a message
